description:
WinCryptHashers is a small plugin for the popular 7-Zip archiver. The plugin enables 7-Zip to display the hash values produced by additional hashing algorithms like MD5. WinCryptHashers also enables 7-Zip to generate text files with checksums.

The plugin can add support for the following hashing algorithms:

- MD2
- MD4
- MD5
- SHA-384
- SHA-512

Important! SHA-384 and SHA-512 may be unavailable in Windows XP unless the Service Packs have been installed.

You can also install the ViPNet CSP cryptographic provider to add support for the following hashing algorithms:

- GOST R 34.11-94
- GOST 34.11-2012 256
- GOST 34.11-2012 512
summary: he plugin enables 7-Zip to display the hash values produced by additional hashing algorithms like MD5
author: Dec Software
